casebody.data:
Friday, June 11, 1999

MOTION DOCKET

99-1041. State ex rel. Wright v. Ohio Bur. of Motor Vehicles.

Cuyahoga App. No. 76044. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of driver’s license suspension during pendency of these appeal proceedings,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, granted.

Douglas and Cook, JJ., dissent.
